title: World is moving into the Indian era: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff
description: India not only performs engineering and support functions for the company, but large Indian customers have seen significant success on the Salesforce platform, Marc Benioff told us.
content: The world is moving into "the Indian era" and the country presents exciting opportunities, said Marc Benioff, chief executive of cloud-based software company Salesforce.
cleaned_content: the world is moving into the indian era and the country presents exciting opportunities said marc benioff chief executive of cloud based software company salesforce
